articles.author: Olaf Storbeck, Stefania Palma
articles.title: Deutsche Bank's DWS to pay $25mn to settle SEC probes - Financial Times
articles.description: Asset manager’s settlement with US regulator includes historic $19mn penalty over greenwashing allegations
articles.content: German asset manager DWS has agreed to pay $19mn to settle charges brought by the US securities regulator over greenwashing allegations, the watchdogs highest penalty related to environmental, social… [+4140 chars]
